short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome Extension for Pinboard Bookmarklet with custom shortcut support
short.zh_CN: Google Chrome Extension 的 Pinboard 小书签扩展，支持自定义快捷键
short.zh_TW: Google Chrome Extension 的 Pinboard 小書籤擴充功能，支援自訂熱鍵

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

- Simple Pinboard official bookmarklet integrated, provided best compatibility for future Pinboard updates.
- Custom keyboard shortcut support

This is a fork version of original Google Chrome Extension for Pinboard by yasuyk, with the following changes:

- No context menu since I rarely use it.
- Better Extension menu appearance.

Source code: https://github.com/sparanoid/pinboard-bookmarklet
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
Google Chrome Extension for Pinboard Bookmarklet with shortcut support.

This is a fork version of original Google Chrome Extension for Pinboard by yasuyk, with the following changes:

- No context menu since I rarely use it.
- Better Extension menu appearance.
